summary: Unknowingly trapped in her role as caretaker of her unappreciative family, a young single woman desperately needs to get her own life. When she volunteers to cat sit at her unrequited love's downtown L.A. loft, her world, as she knows it, changes forever.
cast: Sara Rue|Kelen Coleman|Elliott Gould|Scott Wilson|Hayley Marie Norman|Catherine Hicks|Keri Lynn Pratt|Todd Grinnell|Sophie Monk|Johann Urb|Haaz Sleiman|Jonathan Chase|Krizia Bajos|Melissa Keller|Sonya Eddy|Allen Theosky Rowe|Tonita Castro|Bubba Ganter|Sarah Ripard|Nick Hodaly|Marsha Clark|Jacqueline Hinton
keywords: los angeles california|valley girl|jewish family|father daughter relationship|loft apartment
title: Dorfman
